headline: 5 takeaways from SEC’s actions in ADM accounting scandal
summary: This week’s legal filings contained clues to where the SEC’s accounting fraud case may lead and to what enforcement actions may look like in the second Trump administration.

headline: What Analyst Projections for Key Metrics Reveal About ADM (ADM) Q4 Earnings
summary: Evaluate the expected performance of ADM (ADM) for the quarter ended December 2025, looking beyond the conventional Wall Street top-and-bottom-line estimates and examining some of its key metrics for better insight.

headline: ADM Resolves Nutrition Accounting Case Putting Governance In Investor Focus
summary: Archer Daniels Midland (NYSE:ADM) agreed to pay a US$40 million civil penalty to settle a US Securities and Exchange Commission investigation into past accounting practices in its nutrition segment. The US Department of Justice has closed its related inquiry with no further action. The settlement concludes a period of regulatory scrutiny around ADM’s financial reporting and internal controls. For you as an investor, this sits on top of ADM’s core role in global agriculture, spanning grain...
